message: Starting critique: Gathering phase handover and task context
Analyzing tester agent findings and examining task context
Examining context_accumulator.py implementation for architectural assessment
Analyzing phase_outcomes population flow and integration points
Examining review finalization flow where phase_outcomes are populated

Critique completed. Submitted 8 observations covering architectural strengths (SQLite-based design, clean separation, token budgets), technical debt concerns (DB query inefficiency, token estimation), and suggestions for future improvement (tiktoken, granular truncation). Overall assessment: production-ready implementation with clear architectural intent.
